job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout The AppHarvest Technology GroupbrbrustrongThe AppHarvest Technology Group is redefining agriculture by developing a new class of advanced farming facilities that will be deployed at scale By combining the latest innovations in agriculture with our proprietary technology we will make sustainably grown chemical free food the global standardbrbrOur flagship facility is located in Morehead KY This 60acre indoor growing environment produces 30x more produce peracre uses 90 less water and its location near major urban centers has allowed us to reduce diesel use in transportation by 80 But this is just the beginning and as a member of the Appharvest Technology Group you will be at the forefront of driving the innovations that will transform the worlds food supplybrbrAppHarvest is proud to verify our commitment to people and the planet by being a Certified B Corporation As one of only four public B Corps in the United States we are focused on balancing people and profit Our goal is to promote a future of sustainable change in the agriculture industry while reducing our impact on the planet And were doing it all while creating jobs and helping Appalachia build a more resilient economybrbrThis is Farming NowbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongAs an Entry Level Software Engineer at AppHarvest you will join a team at the forefront of sustainable agriculture by helping architect and build new innovative solutions to expand our product capabilities  You will work closely with our Technology team Greenhouse Operations vendors and customers to build and optimize products as well as advise on opportunities to work with external partners to grow the value of our technology echo system brbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliWork in a collaborative team building our next gen platform architecture   liliHandson contributions in designing building reviewing testing debugging configuring integrating monitoring documenting and maintaining  high performance flexible and highly scalable microservices and integration pipelines that make up our platform  liliReview code to ensure that technical implementation meets functional requirements  liliCollaborate with all the AppHarvest Technology teams to ensure systems are performant scalable resilient and available  liliPromote best practices for development deployment and quality life cycles  liliGuide the growth amp development of engineers with mentoring and training  brliulPlease note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job AppHarvest reserves the right to change duties responsibilities and activities at any time with or without noticebrbrstrongWhat Were Looking Forstrong brulliStrong passion for AppHarvests core values and mission to disrupt the global food industry   liliBachelors degree in Engineering Computer Science or Technology MBA or masters preferred   lili1 years of software engineering experience preferably in the cloud with a proven track record of leading largescale projects liliExperience building web services distributed systems and serviceoriented architecture liliObjectoriented design amp programming experience in languages such as Java C or C liliExperience with the full software development lifecycle for a largescale software product liliPassion to solve complex problems and to build great software    liliExperience of integrating with third party products and applications  liliA figure it out mentality and challenge any notion that this cant be done  liliClear concise and thorough written and oral communication skills   brliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongulli100 company paid insurance premiums Medical Dental and Vision Plans lili401K Company Match 100 of First 3 50 of next 2 and is vested immediately  it is automatically yours lili10 company paid holidays liliGenerous PTO Packages
